message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $13,000. I believe this product will be highly valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit high for me. Would you consider $9,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $9,000 is below my initial asking price, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11,000?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  How about we settle at an even $10,000?
